inclusion.criterion: prostate cancer, amenable for ultrasound ablation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosed by prostate biopsies consist of transrectal ultrasound-guided standard 12 core biopsy

inclusion.criterion: <= 4 cores positive in a standard 12 core biopsy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: <= 4 cores positive in a standard 12 core biopsy

inclusion.criterion: Measured or calculated creatinine clearance (CrCl) >= 30 mL/min/1.73 m^2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must be able to understand and willing to sign a written informed consent document.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP.

exclusion.criterion: The presence of 3 or more MRI visible lesions positive for prostate cancer on biopsy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Targeted lesion ablation length from apex to base of >5 cm or lesion extending >3 cm from the urethra.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Target ablative volume of greater than 100 ml.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of calcifications that would impede ultrasound transmission between the urethra and ablative target.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The participant is unable to tolerate MRI (foreign body, i.e., pacemaker or other implanted device; claustrophobia; inability to tolerate rectal coil; etc.)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Lower urinary tract symptoms defined by an IPSS > 20
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with prostate cancer, amenable for ultrasound ablation. He has adequate organ and marrow function.
